user.description:
Configure meteorological season.

Find historical dates here: [SMHI Season Map](https://www.smhi.se/vader/observationer/arstidskarta)

data_description.history_spring: Definition: Daily average > 0.0°C for 7 consecutive days. Earliest Feb 15.
data_description.history_summer: Definition: Daily average ≥ 10.0°C for 5 consecutive days.
data_description.history_autumn: Definition: Daily average < 10.0°C for 5 consecutive days. Earliest Aug 1.
data_description.history_winter: Definition: Daily average ≤ 0.0°C for 5 consecutive days.

error.cannot_be_future: Date cannot be in the future.
